This webpage is about Jeremy Lin, a Taiwanese-American professional basketball player. It covers his early life, college career, professional basketball journey, including his time in the NBA and other leagues, as well as his impact on racial issues, public image, philanthropy, personal life, and music endeavors. It also includes details about his time with various teams like the New York Knicks, Toronto Raptors, and more. You can learn about his "Linsanity" period, endorsements, and career statistics.
